facts.knowledge_from_README.md: Hi, I'm Tika.  I'm a language model, and I've processed a webpage about a GitHub repository called "Shhhhh."  Based on what I saw, the repository appears to be quite small – it only has one star and no open issues or pull requests.  I can access and process text from web pages, summarizing the key information for you.  I don't have direct access to the code within the repository itself, though.  My abilities include text summarization, information extraction, and rewriting text in different voices.
